value:
$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why can nothing ever go to plan?!$k$pI held truth in the palm of my hand,
like a plaything... Life was so close
to how it should have always been...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Surrender now, Director Letizia.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|It's over, Letizia! Veronica will
arrive here soon. Make this easy
and surrender yourself. Please.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Do you hear yourself?! What fool
would turn themselves over at their
enemy's request?$k$p

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why...$k$pAfter everything... All that sacrifice...$k$pNow I lose to pigs! Pigs who have
wallowed in decadence for so long.$k$pI threw away everything to get the
nobility on my side, and even still...$k$pEverything I went through to sate
their desires, find their weaknesses...
All that work amounts to nothing!$k$pI am Letizia! Ninth in Embla's line
of succession! I am above the filth
and the rabble!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Sissy...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Ahh... Veronica, here at the end...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|How did you do it? I keep asking
myself, but I cannot understand...$k$pWhat did you promise your guards
to get them to free you?$k$pI always knew the lowborn masses
were fond of you, but I had not
imagined you held so much sway.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|"Lowborn masses"? Sissy...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Yes, tell me, Veronica. Tell me how
you won their favor!$k$pMoney? Perhaps something...
less savory?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You want to be emperor, Sissy?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Have I not made that clear?!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|If you had everyone's best interest
at heart, I would love to have you
sitting on the throne, Sissy...$k$pI am...not suited for it. I know that.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|But I hear the way you speak about
our people...$k$pAnd even so close to the throne,
you think only of yourself, ignoring
the suffering you cause.$k$pThat is why I cannot allow you
to become emperor...$k$pYou are unfit for the throne!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-how dare you!$k$p$Sbs150|
